summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5518 for the improvement of West Boston Street, from 26th Avenue West to 28th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70612, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
